::DrillBit::

DrillBit continued to moniter the pods DNA sensor scans, hoping they
would have a new Predicon soon.

::Hot Rod::

Hot Rod was working on the Ark, when Silver Sting's message came over
the comm-link.
"This is Maximal, Hot Rod."He replyed.
"I'm tracking your signal, and I'll be there ASAP." He cut off the comm,
and ran outside.
"Vehical mode." He transformed to sports car mode, and headed for Silver
Sting's position.
